summary: Ahmet Ertegun created a new genre of music that combined the African-American music of 1940s Washington, D.C., with the European sensibility.
cast: Ahmet Ertegun|Bette Midler|Ruth Brown|Ray Charles|Eric Clapton|Lyor Cohen|Phil Collins|Nesuhi Ertegün|Aretha Franklin|David Geffen|Mick Jagger|Kid Rock|Jimmy Page|Robert Plant|Otis Redding|Jerry Wexler
title: Atlantic Records: The House That Ahmet Built
